name: Crawler Armor
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a Patch of Skincrawler Hide ( ie : #L "Patch of Hard Skincrawler Hide" "245211" ) #L "Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor)" "162220" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Mass Relocating Robot (Shape Soft Armor) + a Patch of Skincrawler Hide = a piece of Crawler Armor Skills: | ?? | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Crawler Armor Gloves" "245118" #L "Crawler Armor Sleeves" "245119" #L "Crawler Armor Pants" "245120" #L "Crawler Armor Boots" "245122" #L "Crawler Body Armor" "245123" #L "Crawler Armor Hood" "245124" #L "Crawler Armor Shoulder Pad" "245125" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Another great example of crafted armor. The hide can be found in CoH.
